blogPost.title: RT @Breaking911: BREAKING: New York City establishments with a Liquor License, only allowed to operate outdoors, are now also banned from a…
blogPost.author: The_Real_Fly

sharedContent.title: BREAKING: New York City establishments with a Liquor License, only allowed to operate outdoors, are now also banned from allowing customers to use the restroom or pick-up food indoors. Other restrictions also added.
sharedContent.author: Breaking911

localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 突破：纽约市拥有酒类许可证的机构，只允许在户外经营，现在也被禁止允许顾客在室内使用洗手间或取食物。还增加了其他限制。
突破：紐約市擁有酒類許可證的機構，只允許在戶外經營，現在也被禁止允許顧客在室內使用洗手間或取食物。還增加了其他限制。
